title: I’m a Professional NPC - Novel Updates
author: Sichuan Pepper   蜀椒
description:
A professional NPC’s motto is: Everything for the player.

…: This NPC dares to mess with us?!

Qing Ya: You guys continue, I’m just passing by. Eh… I’ll get some experience while I’m at it.

…: Aaah, kill her!

Come come, let us kill each other.>
